Item.Name: Casual/Career Navy Blazer Womens Size Medium
Item.Description: This is a really nice Womens Size Medium Navy Blue Blazer that would look good with pants or skirt at work or with Jeans for the casual look. It really hugs the figure with two darts in the front (7" long on both sides) and two in the back (14" long-start about a third of the way down and go all the way to the hem). The tag says it is made by Classica. There doesn't appear to be a tag saying what the fabric is but it feels like wool and is completely lined with what feels like a soft shiny fabric that matches the navy in the Blazer. There is a tag that says Professionally Dry Clean Only. It has one slit breast pocket (which is still sewn shut), two front slit pockets that are open and a single front button. The sleeves are 24" from the shoulder seam and at the cuff of each sleeve there are four buttons in a vertical row a little smaller than the one front button. The length of the blazer from top of back to hem is 25". S&H is actual or $3.50 for Priority Mail. Please email any questions.

Item.Name: RARE Black BROADTAIL Coat PERSIAN Lamb NR

Bidder.Location: WIDE WORLD OFAUTOGRAPHS of Salem, SC

Item.Description: Black Broadtail Full Length Coat _ Elegant Black Broadtail Lamb! Description: Up for auction, I have a fabulous RARE full length, black, genuine Broadtail, fur coat. The label reads ARNOLD CONSTABLE - FIFTH AVENUE. I have seen this fur (correctly or incorrectly) sold on Ebay as Persian Lamb, Caracul, Curly Lamb, Krimmer, astrakhan, and Swakara, however, the correct name is 'Broadtail'. A little history on Broadtail,...It is the black pelt of a Karakul sheep that was born too soon and is therefor often referred to as unborn lamb. Broadtail is actually a more prized, and a lot harder to come by, fur than the other lambs. In the market, it is the most expensive of the Karakul pelts. It has a flat (lower nap) silky velvet-like surface and a wavy rippled ( moir_ velvet-like ) a ppearance. Most Broadtail skins are produced in central and southwestern Asia, southwestern Africa, India, and southeastern Europe. A few are produced in Texas. A full length Broadtail coat truly is a rare find. Generally, Broadtail is only seen in the shorter, mink cuffed, mink collar ed jacket style your grandmother so proudly wore to the theater. If this coat fit me, you would not be seeing it on listed on EBay. The style of the coat is very current. The sleeves are a regular full length ( not 3/4 ) and are fashioned with windbreakers - the inside lining is elasticized at the bottom - to keep the wind out and you snug. A great feature! The center front has a hook and loop closure. There are 2 velvet lined pockets on either side that look like they've never had anything in them. The quality of the pelts is comparable to my Schiaparelli s. The fur is in excellent, soft, shiny, condition and the skins are supple. There is no drying or shedding. The lining is made out of a black jacquard fabric - feels and looks like silk but I'm not 100% sure it is - and is in pristine condition. The former owner's name - Hilda - is embroidered into the lining. This coat can be dressed up or down! Wear it..... ....On the weekend over a pair of black Banana Republic jeans, a thick fitted camel cabled cashmere turtleneck sweater, and black leather ankle shoe boots. ....To work (over the holiday season), with a long black suede skirt and a fitted red ribbed cashmere turtleneck. ....To dinner over slate charcoal grey velvet pants, a cashmere twinset, and a string of gray baroque pearls.....So Grace Kelly - ish. Dress it up with a black Mongolian Lamb boa, a dyed fox boa, or a black mink collar as I have in the 5th pic. If you haven't owned a Broadtail coat yet, now is the time. They are as warm as Shearling. When the temperature dips and the wind kicks up, there is nothing that will keep you as toasty warm as one of these fur coats. The condition is excellent. There are no strange odors. The only 'issues' I can find are that 3 of the loops at the center front closure are missing. They are a standard type of fur loop so you will easily find a replacement at a fabric / sewing supplies store or from a furrier. There is also a 1 inch area at the underarm seam that needs restitching. If I am able to get to it, I will have my seamstress take care of this before I ship but because of the time of year it is, I cant promise. ***Sorry, the Russian sable mink collar displayed with the coat is not included in this auction. If you like the look though, scope out Ebay for one. There always seem to be some up for auction. This coat will be shipped to you from my smoke free home. Measuremen ts: All measurements are approximate. There is no size tag in this jacket. I would put it at a Large (L, 10, 12) though that because of the style could also fit a Medium ( 8 ) or XL ( 14 ) depending on how you like your outerwear to fit. Please go by the measurements though. All measurements taken on the outside of the coat. Center back neckline seam to hem = 43 inches long - not including the collar Shoulder to shoulder = 16 inches - measured across the top Bust = 43 inches around - measured on the outside of the coat Sweep (Bottom edge with coat buttoned) = 62 inches around Sleeve length = 24 inches - shoulder seam to sleeve edge uncuffed / 21 1/4 inches with cuff fully rolled back. _ _ Please check my M E page, before bidding, for all the terms and conditions of this auction. ..... HERE to view PICS of my other auctions!..... Thank You for Shopping with Me. Good Luck and Happy EBuying!!! ObayB

Item.Description: CHING DYNASTY POTTERY SHARD PENDANT AND CHAIN Makes a great gift for Any Occasion Description I think this pendant is absolutely fantastic!!! This quite unique pendant features a pottery shard unearthed from an ancient Chinese pottery factory, and its framed in silver plate. These date to at least the Ching Dynasty and perhaps to the Ming Dynasty. The Ching Dynasty was a Manchu Dynasty and was the last Imperial dynasty. Potentially 600-900 years old!!! Fantastic unique and rare jewelry item in this!! Perfect to add to your own collection or a gift for that "hard to buy for" friend or relative. If you like different, unique, eclectic, or Asian arts and antiques - then this one is perfect!! I'm including a silver plated diamond cut rope chain with this to make it ready to go!! Bright silver chain with spring ring clasp. AND, I WILL GIVE YOU YOUR CHOICE OF EITHER AN 18 INCH OR 24 INCH CHAIN. Each of these is one-of-a-kind and unique. All are lovely - just let me choose one for you. I could envision this sold in a jewelry store, upscale clothing and jewelry boutique, or antiques shop or show at at least $29.95 or higher!! Item.Name: MINT ERMENEGILDO ZEGNA SPORTCOAT 42L 42 L
Item.Description: MINT ERMENEGILDO ZEGNA SPORTCOAT 42L 42 L WE NOW ACCEPT CONSIGNMENTS FROM YOU...DROP US A LINE!!709 This is a typically impressive two button single breasted sportcoat from the great looms of Ermenegildo Zegna. This gorgeous jacket is made from a very soft smooth black pure wool fabric that is accentuated by very faint grey/white chalk line pinstripes.IN EXCELLENT CONDITION This immaculately crafted coat was made in Italy, and comes from one of the primere designer labels on the planet.The jacket is unvented and features 3 inner pockets and each sleeve has 3 buttons on it, all of which are made from a black and grey swirling shell. The hand stitching on this coat is exemplary, showing that the collar, lapels and linings were attentively placed by needle and thimble, the old fashioned way! MADE IN ITALY The quality of this jacket's craftsmanship is impeccable. Why in the world every tailor doesn't put this type of concern into their clothing I don't understand....I mean if you put your name on something wouldn't you?? PLEASE ENJOY THIS LITTLE BIO ABOUT THIS FAMOUS TAILOR/DESIGNER ERMENEGILDO ZEGNA, AND HIS FIRM: Zegna is a world leader in fine menswear. Being second to none in the search for excellence. Beginning in 1910 as a wool mill, they also supply fabric to top designers such as Giorgio Armani. In its fourth generation of family ownership, Ermenegildo Zegna SPECIALIZES IN THE FINEST QUALITY MENSWEAR. The Zegna label stands not only for refined, tailored men's clothing, but also expert personal service. Of course, the label also comes with a price, which can run into the thousands for a tailored suit, up to $300 for a shirt. The menswear collection includes the "sartorial" line of classic three-button suits, jackets, trousers, and shirts. Ties, too (one of which Monica Lewinsky gave Bill Clinton). The sportswear line of slacks, shirts and sweaters is relaxed, yet distinguished. Ermenegildo Zegna today is an internationally established brand name, synonymous with high quality. MEASUREMENTS JACKET SHOULDERS 20" SLEEVE 26"(1.5" TO LET OUT) CHEST 46" WAIST 42" LENGTH 31.5" from the bottom of the collar. It is is baby blue in color, and made of ultra sheer baby blue mesh. On this sheer mesh is ~gorgeous~ embroiderey, in two different shades of light blue (one is a light baby blue and the other is a lilac light blue). This embroidery is very ornate and nicely made - very high quality. The bra is underwire with a rear double hook and adjustable straps. It has demi styled cups, and twinned straps with bow accents. The embroidery on the cups continues around onto the sides and back. The first panty available is a high cut panty, with the sheer/embroidery on the front, and a smooth nylon back with a keyhole accent. The second is a tanga styled panty, with both sides made of the sheer mesh and embroidery. This is a designer brand, made in France, and sells in high end boutiques and department stores liks Neimans and Saks 5th Avenue. It is comparable in style, comfort and price to La Perla, Nefer and Simone Perele. CONDITION Brand new with tag! Never worn! This set retails for over $250.00! This item is from a smoke free home. Sign up today. It's FREE, FAST, and get paid $5.00 to do it! What a deal! That about covers the shipping cost for this item! Please visit our many other auctions BID WITH CONFIDENCE! 2,000+ Positive Feedbacks! If this is your first time bidding with us, please read our FAQ Page. If you cannot comply with the terms of the auction, please do not bid. FAQ HOW CAN YOU SELL SO CHEAP? WHERE DO YOU GET THE STUFF? We specialize in the remarketing of New, Used, and Distressed Merchandise. These items are from overstock warehouses, company liquidations, freight claims, bulk auctions, and insurance purchases. This means that some items may be missing manuals, cords, cables, disks, factory packaging and/or may have light to severe damage. Please read the ENTIRE auction and ask ALL questions prior to bidding. We suggest you call or visit the manufacturer's page for detailed information. Items may have come originally with accessories such as remotes, cables, or batteries. If it's not listed in the description, don't expect it. WHAT DO YOU MEAN BY "UNTESTED" AND "AS-IS"? Please understand that our warehouse does not have the equipment, facilities, or time to fully test every item. We offer a "cursory" inspection on all items and list our findings in the auction description. We supply all available Make/Model information for you to review and research. Please do your own research prior to bidding. All items and contents are described to the best of our ability. Unless the auction description states differently, these items are sold and "as-is". We reserve the right to refuse sale or service for any reason. WHEN SHOULD I SEND PAYMENT? Payment is due within 10 days of the closing of the auction. Otherwise, we reserve the right to re-post or re-sell this item and request credit from eBay, at our discretion. Acceptable forms of payment include Cashier Checks, Money Orders, and Bank Wire Transfers. If necessary, we can accept personal or company checks. We normally ship within 3-5 business days for certified funds. We hold all checks for 7-10 working days for validation. We do not use I-Escrow or any other escrow company. Other payment terms may be available and will be disclosed in our "Payment Email" that will be sent to you at the end of the auction. Unless otherwise stated, Sales are final. All others we offer a 50% restocking fee for any returns, less shipping and paypal fees (if applicable). I WON MORE THAN ONE ITEM OR I AM BIDDING ON MORE OF YOUR AUCTIONS. SHOULD I WAIT AND SEND PAYMENTS ALL AT ONCE? I MAY SAVE A BUCK OR TWO? Although we appreciate you bidding on more of our items, it would be more efficient if you sent in each payment as the item closes. We use an automated system and it sends out confirmations, feedbacks, Non-Pay Bidder Reminders, and other eBay related operations automatically. That's why it's so important to get payment in within 10 days of the close of the auction and keep auctions as separate transactions. If you delay, you may get warnings from eBay or you may actually lose your item because it got re-posted. We also do not combine shipping fees because we ship from various warehouses and cannot guarantee that items will be shipped together. Also, it requires us to manually do each multiple order and that interferes with our automated system. Therfore, we do not combine shipping fees. If you get multiple items shipped together, it's just a matter of luck and chance. HOW DO YOU SHIP WITH AND WHAT IF I'M OUTSIDE YOUR STANDARD SHIPPING AREA? We ship via UPS Ground from Connecticut, 06804. For books, videos, CDs video games and other media we may offer Media Mail Rates. If available, it would be listed in the auction description. We cannot ship to PO BOXES or Military APO addresses. If you are outside the 48 contiguous US states, shipping fees are more. Please contact us for the estimated rates prior to bidding. PAYPAL USERS: We can ONLY ship to verified Paypal addresses. If you want it shipped to a different address send your payment via the mail. Whenever possible, we will provide shipping weights and/or fixed shipping costs. Fixed shipping rates are for shipping within the 48 contiguous states. If you are outside of this area, contact us prior to bidding. Shipping will be higher. Sorry, we do not combine shipping fees. It screws up our automated accounting and shipping programs. HOW WILL I KNOW WHEN YOU RECEIVE MY PAYMENT OR WHEN MY ITEM IS SHIPPED? We issue the buyer a Positive Feedback the day your payment is received and entered. You can use this as a reference of when your item will be shipped. If you provide us an email, we will email you a tracking number. All shipping questions should be directed to shipping@highendequipment.com. We are no longer responsible for items once it is picked up by the courier. If damage occurs during transit, we will assist in the claims process. No product refunds will be issued until the claim is paid. Shipping fees are not refundable for any reason. ANYTHING ELSE BEFORE I BID? Please read all the information on the auction and do your research prior to bidding. If you have any questions, please call our office at 203-740-9111 or email us at inquiry@highendequipment.com. By placing a bid on this auction you are confirming that you have read all the information, asked all your questions, and understand the terms of this auction. NICE FEEDBACK RATING, BUT WHY DO YOU HAVE SO MANY NEGATIVES? The fact of the matter is, we are only human. We do make mistakes. We also use automated systems and internet based platforms to help automate the selling process. We can fix our human errors, unfortunately the others are not as easy. We can't fix external programs like eBay or AuctionWatch. Most problems can be resolved with one phone call. We try our best to service all customers and when we make a mistake, we take care of it. Not every buyer gives us the opportunity to correct for our mistakes. Most of our negatives are from new users who don't understand or respect the rules of eBay. They don't read the auctions and are not very good shoppers. If a problem comes up, they SLAM a Negative Feedback and not even give us a chance to address the issue. Basically, when we are given the opportunity, we take care of everybody. Hey, you can't be an eBay PowerSeller without doing something right! MAN, WHY DON'T YOU GUYS RETURN EMAILS FASTER? Everyone in our company travels frequently to find the best deals to bring to you on eBay. Therefore, it is difficult for us to return emails in a timely manner. If all else fails, call our office for assistance. 203-740-9111. Office hours are Mon-Fri 9am-5pm EST. We strive to bring you the best items at the very best prices possible! Sign up today. It's FREE, FAST, and get paid $5.00 to do it! What a deal! That about covers the shipping cost for this item! Please visit our many other auctions BID WITH CONFIDENCE! 2,000+ Positive Feedbacks! If this is your first time bidding with us, please read our FAQ Page. If you cannot comply with the terms of the auction, please do not bid. FAQ HOW CAN YOU SELL SO CHEAP? WHERE DO YOU GET THE STUFF? We specialize in the remarketing of New, Used, and Distressed Merchandise. These items are from overstock warehouses, company liquidations, freight claims, bulk auctions, and insurance purchases. This means that some items may be missing manuals, cords, cables, disks, factory packaging and/or may have light to severe damage. Please read the ENTIRE auction and ask ALL questions prior to bidding. We suggest you call or visit the manufacturer's page for detailed information. Items may have come originally with accessories such as remotes, cables, or batteries. If it's not listed in the description, don't expect it. WHAT DO YOU MEAN BY "UNTESTED" AND "AS-IS"? Please understand that our warehouse does not have the equipment, facilities, or time to fully test every item. We offer a "cursory" inspection on all items and list our findings in the auction description. We supply all available Make/Model information for you to review and research. Please do your own research prior to bidding. All items and contents are described to the best of our ability. Unless the auction description states differently, these items are sold and "as-is". We reserve the right to refuse sale or service for any reason. WHEN SHOULD I SEND PAYMENT? Payment is due within 10 days of the closing of the auction. Otherwise, we reserve the right to re-post or re-sell this item and request credit from eBay, at our discretion. Acceptable forms of payment include Cashier Checks, Money Orders, and Bank Wire Transfers. If necessary, we can accept personal or company checks. We normally ship within 3-5 business days for certified funds. We hold all checks for 7-10 working days for validation. We do not use I-Escrow or any other escrow company. Other payment terms may be available and will be disclosed in our "Payment Email" that will be sent to you at the end of the auction. Unless otherwise stated, Sales are final. All others we offer a 50% restocking fee for any returns, less shipping and paypal fees (if applicable). I WON MORE THAN ONE ITEM OR I AM BIDDING ON MORE OF YOUR AUCTIONS. SHOULD I WAIT AND SEND PAYMENTS ALL AT ONCE? I MAY SAVE A BUCK OR TWO? Although we appreciate you bidding on more of our items, it would be more efficient if you sent in each payment as the item closes. We use an automated system and it sends out confirmations, feedbacks, Non-Pay Bidder Reminders, and other eBay related operations automatically. That's why it's so important to get payment in within 10 days of the close of the auction and keep auctions as separate transactions. If you delay, you may get warnings from eBay or you may actually lose your item because it got re-posted. We also do not combine shipping fees because we ship from various warehouses and cannot guarantee that items will be shipped together. Also, it requires us to manually do each multiple order and that interferes with our automated system. Therfore, we do not combine shipping fees. If you get multiple items shipped together, it's just a matter of luck and chance. HOW DO YOU SHIP WITH AND WHAT IF I'M OUTSIDE YOUR STANDARD SHIPPING AREA? We ship via UPS Ground from Connecticut, 06804. For books, videos, CDs video games and other media we may offer Media Mail Rates. If available, it would be listed in the auction description. We cannot ship to PO BOXES or Military APO addresses. If you are outside the 48 contiguous US states, shipping fees are more. Please contact us for the estimated rates prior to bidding. PAYPAL USERS: We can ONLY ship to verified Paypal addresses. If you want it shipped to a different address send your payment via the mail. Whenever possible, we will provide shipping weights and/or fixed shipping costs. Fixed shipping rates are for shipping within the 48 contiguous states. If you are outside of this area, contact us prior to bidding. Shipping will be higher. Sorry, we do not combine shipping fees. It screws up our automated accounting and shipping programs. HOW WILL I KNOW WHEN YOU RECEIVE MY PAYMENT OR WHEN MY ITEM IS SHIPPED? We issue the buyer a Positive Feedback the day your payment is received and entered. You can use this as a reference of when your item will be shipped. If you provide us an email, we will email you a tracking number. All shipping questions should be directed to shipping@highendequipment.com. We are no longer responsible for items once it is picked up by the courier. If damage occurs during transit, we will assist in the claims process. No product refunds will be issued until the claim is paid. Shipping fees are not refundable for any reason. ANYTHING ELSE BEFORE I BID? Please read all the information on the auction and do your research prior to bidding. If you have any questions, please call our office at 203-740-9111 or email us at inquiry@highendequipment.com. By placing a bid on this auction you are confirming that you have read all the information, asked all your questions, and understand the terms of this auction. NICE FEEDBACK RATING, BUT WHY DO YOU HAVE SO MANY NEGATIVES? The fact of the matter is, we are only human. We do make mistakes. We also use automated systems and internet based platforms to help automate the selling process. We can fix our human errors, unfortunately the others are not as easy. We can't fix external programs like eBay or AuctionWatch. Most problems can be resolved with one phone call. We try our best to service all customers and when we make a mistake, we take care of it. Not every buyer gives us the opportunity to correct for our mistakes. Most of our negatives are from new users who don't understand or respect the rules of eBay. They don't read the auctions and are not very good shoppers. If a problem comes up, they SLAM a Negative Feedback and not even give us a chance to address the issue. Basically, when we are given the opportunity, we take care of everybody. Hey, you can't be an eBay PowerSeller without doing something right! MAN, WHY DON'T YOU GUYS RETURN EMAILS FASTER? Everyone in our company travels frequently to find the best deals to bring to you on eBay. Therefore, it is difficult for us to return emails in a timely manner. If all else fails, call our office for assistance. 203-740-9111. Office hours are Mon-Fri 9am-5pm EST. We strive to bring you the best items at the very best prices possible!
